   20: 
   21: -module(openssl_stapling_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   25: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   26: 
   27: %% Callback functions
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2,
   33:          end_per_group/2,
   34:          init_per_testcase/2,
   35:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   36: 
   37: %% Testcases
   38: -export([staple_by_issuer/0, staple_by_issuer/1,
   39:          staple_by_designated/0, staple_by_designated/1,
   40:          staple_by_trusted/0, staple_by_trusted/1,
   41:          staple_not_designated/0, staple_not_designated/1,
   42:          staple_wrong_issuer/0, staple_wrong_issuer/1,
   43:          staple_with_nonce/0, staple_with_nonce/1,
   44:          cert_status_revoked/0, cert_status_revoked/1,
   45:          cert_status_undetermined/0, cert_status_undetermined/1,
   46:          staple_missing/0, staple_missing/1
   47:         ]).
   48: 
   49: %% spawn export
   50: -export([ocsp_responder_init/3]).
   51: -define(OCSP_RESPONDER_LOG, "ocsp_resp_log.txt").
   52: -define(DEBUG, false).
   53: 
   54: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   55: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   56: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   57: all() ->
   58:     [{group, 'tlsv1.3'},
   59:      {group, no_next_update},
   60:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
   61:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'}].
   62: 
   63: groups() ->
   64:     [{'tlsv1.3', [], ocsp_tests()},
   65:      {no_next_update, [], [{group, 'tlsv1.3'}]},
   66:      {'tlsv1.2', [], ocsp_tests()},
   67:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], ocsp_tests()}].
   68: 
   69: ocsp_tests() ->
   70:     positive() ++ negative().
   71: 
   72: positive() ->
   73:     [staple_by_issuer,
   74:      staple_by_designated,
   75:      staple_by_trusted,
   76:      staple_with_nonce].
   77: 
   78: negative() ->
   79:     [staple_not_designated,
   80:      staple_wrong_issuer,
   81:      cert_status_revoked,
   82:      cert_status_undetermined,
   83:      staple_missing].
   84: 
   85: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   86: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   87:     Config = [{debug, ?DEBUG}] ++
   88:         ssl_test_lib:init_per_suite(Config0, openssl),
   89:     case ssl_test_lib:openssl_ocsp_support(Config) of
   90:         true ->
   91:             do_init_per_suite(Config);
   92:         false ->
   93:             {skip, "OCSP not well supported in openSSL"}
   94:     end.
   95: 
   96: do_init_per_suite(Config) ->
   97:     {ok, _} = make_certs:all(?config(data_dir, Config),
   98:                              ?config(priv_dir, Config)),
   99:     ssl_test_lib:cert_options(Config).
  100: 
  101: end_per_suite(Config) ->
  102:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_suite(Config).
  103: 
  104: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  105: init_per_group(no_next_update, Config) ->
  106:     Config;
  107: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  108:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group_openssl(GroupName, Config).
  109: 
  110: end_per_group(no_next_update, Config) ->
  111:     Config;
  112: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  113:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  114: 
  115: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  116: init_per_testcase(staple_by_trusted = Testcase, Config) ->
  117:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  118:     ok = public_key:cacerts_load(filename:join(PrivDir, "otpCA/cacerts.pem")),
  119:     init_per_testcase_helper(Testcase, Config);
  120: init_per_testcase(Testcase, Config) ->
  121:     init_per_testcase_helper(Testcase, Config).
  122: 
  123: init_per_testcase_helper(Testcase, Config0) ->
  124:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  125:     Default = "otpCA",
  126:     TestcaseMapping = #{staple_by_issuer => Default,
  127:                         staple_by_trusted => "erlangCA",
  128:                         staple_by_designated => "b.server",
  129:                         staple_not_designated => "a.server",
  130:                         staple_wrong_issuer => "localhost"},
  131:     ResponderFolder = maps:get(Testcase, TestcaseMapping, Default),
  132:     Config = start_ocsp_responder(
  133:                [{responder_folder, ResponderFolder} | Config0]) ++ Config0,
  134:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  135:     Config.
  136: 
  137: end_per_testcase(staple_by_trusted, Config) ->
  138:     public_key:cacerts_load(),
  139:     end_per_testcase_helper(Config);
  140: end_per_testcase(_Testcase, Config) ->
  141:     end_per_testcase_helper(Config).
  142: 
  143: end_per_testcase_helper(Config) ->
  144:     ResponderPid = ?config(responder_pid, Config),
  145:     ssl_test_lib:close(ResponderPid),
  146:     [ssl_test_lib:ct_pal_file(?OCSP_RESPONDER_LOG) || ?config(debug, Config)],
  147:     Config.
  148: 
  149: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  150: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  151: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  152: %% Test various certs used for signing OCSP response
  153: %% Assuming Issuer issued a.server certificate used by TLS server
  154: %% 1. otpCA - [OK] Issuer signs response directly
  155: %% 2. b.server - [OK] Responder certificate issued directly by Issuer
  156: %%                     and designated for OCSP signing
  157: %% 3 localhost - [OK] Certificate not issued by Issuer, but present in trust store
  158: %% 4. a.server - [NOK] Certificate signed directly by Issuer but not designated
  159: %% 5. localhost - [NOK] Certificate not issued by Issuer
  160: 
  161: staple_by_issuer() ->
  162:     [{doc, "Verify OCSP stapling works without nonce."
  163:       "Response signed directly by issuer of server certificate"}].
  164: staple_by_issuer(Config)
  165:   when is_list(Config) ->
  166:     stapling_helper(Config, #{ocsp_nonce => false}).
  167: 
  168: staple_by_designated() ->
  169:     [{doc,"Verify OCSP stapling works without nonce."
  170:       "Response signed with certificate issued directly by issuer of server "
  171:       "certificate and is designated for OCSP signing (extKeyUsage allows "
  172:       "for OCSP signing)."}].
  173: staple_by_designated(Config)
  174:   when is_list(Config) ->
  175:     stapling_helper(Config, #{ocsp_nonce => false}).
  176: 
  177: staple_by_trusted() ->
  178:     [{doc,"Verify OCSP stapling works without nonce."
  179:       "Response signed with certificate issued directly by issuer of server "
  180:       "certificate and is designated for OCSP signing (extKeyUsage allows "
  181:       "for OCSP signing)."}].
  182: staple_by_trusted(Config)
  183:   when is_list(Config) ->
  184:     stapling_helper(Config, #{ocsp_nonce => false}).
  185: 
  186: staple_with_nonce() ->
  187:     [{doc, "Verify OCSP stapling works with nonce."}].
  188: staple_with_nonce(Config)
  189:   when is_list(Config) ->
  190:     stapling_helper(Config, #{ocsp_nonce => true}).
  191: 
  192: stapling_helper(Config, StaplingOpt) ->
  193:     %% ok = logger:set_application_level(ssl, debug),
  194:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  195:     CACertsFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "a.server/cacerts.pem"),
  196:     Data = "ping",  %% 4 bytes
  197:     GroupName = undefined,
  198:     ServerOpts = [{group, GroupName}],
  199:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(openssl_ocsp,
  200:                                        [{options, ServerOpts}], Config),
  201:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  202: 
  203:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{verify, verify_peer},
  204:                                            {cacertfile, CACertsFile},
  205:                                            {server_name_indication, disable},
  206:                                            {stapling, StaplingOpt}],
  207:                                           Config),
  208:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client(erlang,
  209:                                        [{port, Port},
  210:                                         {options, ClientOpts}], Config),
  211:     true = is_pid(Client),
  212:     ssl_test_lib:send(Server, Data),
  213:     Data = ssl_test_lib:check_active_receive(Client, Data),
  214:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  215:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  216: 
  217: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  218: staple_not_designated() ->
  219:     [{doc,"Verify OCSP stapling works without nonce."
  220:       "Response signed with certificate issued directly by issuer of server "
  221:       "certificate but not  designated for OCSP signing (extKeyUsage missing "
  222:       "OCSP signing)."}].
  223: staple_not_designated(Config)
  224:   when is_list(Config) ->
  225:     stapling_negative_helper(Config, "a.server/cacerts.pem",
  226:                                   openssl_ocsp, bad_certificate).
  227: 
  228: staple_wrong_issuer() ->
  229:     [{doc,"Verify OCSP stapling works without nonce."
  230:       "Response signed with certificate not related to issuer of server "
  231:       "certificate."}].
  232: staple_wrong_issuer(Config)
  233:   when is_list(Config) ->
  234:     stapling_negative_helper(Config, "a.server/cacerts.pem",
  235:                                   openssl_ocsp, bad_certificate).
  236: 
  237: cert_status_revoked() ->
  238:     [{doc, "Verify OCSP stapling works with revoked certificate."}].
  239: cert_status_revoked(Config)
  240:   when is_list(Config) ->
  241:     stapling_negative_helper(Config, "revoked/cacerts.pem",
  242:                                   openssl_ocsp_revoked, certificate_revoked).
  243: 
  244: cert_status_undetermined() ->
  245:     [{doc, "Verify OCSP stapling works with certificate with undetermined status."}].
  246: cert_status_undetermined(Config)
  247:   when is_list(Config) ->
  248:     stapling_negative_helper(Config, "undetermined/cacerts.pem",
  249:                                   openssl_ocsp_undetermined, bad_certificate).
  250: 
  251: staple_missing() ->
  252:     [{doc, "Verify OCSP stapling works with a missing OCSP response."}].
  253: staple_missing(Config)
  254:   when is_list(Config) ->
  255:     %% Start a server that will not include an OCSP response.
  256:     stapling_negative_helper(Config, "a.server/cacerts.pem",
  257:                                   openssl, bad_certificate).
  258: 
  259: stapling_negative_helper(Config, CACertsPath, ServerVariant, ExpectedError) ->
  260:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  261:     CACertsFile = filename:join(PrivDir, CACertsPath),
  262:     GroupName = undefined,
  263:     ServerOpts = [{group, GroupName}],
  264:     {ClientNode, _ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  265:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server(ServerVariant,
  266:                                        [{options, ServerOpts}], Config),
  267:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  268: 
  269:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options([{verify, verify_peer},
  270:                                            {server_name_indication, disable},
  271:                                            {cacertfile, CACertsFile},
  272:                                            {stapling, #{ocsp_nonce => true}}],
  273:                                           Config),
  274:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode},{port, Port},
  275:                                               {host, Hostname}, {from, self()},
  276:                                               {options, ClientOpts}]),
  277:     true = is_pid(Client),
  278:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Client, ExpectedError).
  279: 
  280: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  281: %% Internal functions -----------------------------------------------
  282: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  283: start_ocsp_responder(Config) ->
  284:     ResponderPort = get_free_port(),
  285:     Starter = self(),
  286:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  287:     Pid = erlang:spawn_link(?MODULE, ocsp_responder_init,
  288:                             [ResponderPort, Starter, Config]),
  289:     receive
  290:         {started, Pid} ->
  291:             [{responder_port, ResponderPort}, {responder_pid, Pid}];
  292:         {'EXIT', Pid, Reason} ->
  293:             throw({unable_to_start_ocsp_service, Reason})
  294:     end.
  295: 
  296: ocsp_responder_init(ResponderPort, Starter, Config) ->
  297:     ResponderFolder = ?config(responder_folder, Config),
  298:     PrivDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  299:     Index = filename:join(PrivDir, "otpCA/index.txt"),
  300:     CACerts = filename:join(PrivDir, "otpCA/cacerts.pem"),
  301:     Cert = filename:join(PrivDir, ResponderFolder ++ "/cert.pem"),
  302:     %% search for key.pem file, since generated intermediate CAs
  303:     %% "hide" their key.pem inside "private" subfolder
  304:     [Key] = filelib:fold_files(filename:join(PrivDir, ResponderFolder),
  305:                                "key.pem", true, fun(X, Acc) -> [X | Acc] end, []),
  306:     Debug = case ?config(debug, Config) of
  307:                     true -> ["-text", "-out", ?OCSP_RESPONDER_LOG];
  308:                     _ -> []
  309:                 end,
  310:     NextUpdate = case ?config(tc_group_path, Config) of
  311:                      [[{name,no_next_update}]] ->
  312:                          [];
  313:                      _ ->
  314:                          ["-nmin", "5"]
  315:                  end,
  316:     Args = ["ocsp", "-index", Index, "-CA", CACerts, "-rsigner", Cert,
  317:             "-rkey", Key, "-port",  erlang:integer_to_list(ResponderPort)] ++
  318:         Debug ++ NextUpdate,
  319:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  320:     Port = ssl_test_lib:portable_open_port("openssl", Args),
  321:     ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: Started Port = ~p", [Port]),
  322:     ocsp_responder_loop(Port, {new, Starter}).
  323: 
  324: ocsp_responder_loop(Port, {Status, Starter} = State) ->
  325:     receive
  326:         close ->
  327:             ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: received close", []),
  328:             ok;
  329: 	{Port, closed} ->
  330: 	    ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: Port = ~p Closed", [Port]),
  331: 	    ok;
  332: 	{'EXIT', Sender, _Reason} ->
  333: 	    ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: Sender = ~p Closed",[Sender]),
  334: 	    ok;
  335: 	{Port, {data, Msg}} when Status == new ->
  336:             ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: Msg = ~p", [Msg]),
  337:             Starter ! {started, self()},
  338: 	    ocsp_responder_loop(Port, {started, undefined});
  339:         {Port, {data, Msg}} ->
  340: 	    ?CT_LOG("OCSP responder: Responder Msg = ~p",[Msg]),
  341:             ocsp_responder_loop(Port, State)
  342:     after 1000 ->
  343:             case Status of
  344:                 new ->
  345:                     exit(no_ocsp_server);
  346:                 _  ->
  347:                     ocsp_responder_loop(Port, State)
  348:             end
  349:     end.
  350: 
  351: get_free_port() ->
  352:     {ok, Listen} = gen_tcp:listen(0, [{reuseaddr, true}]),
  353:     {ok, Port} = inet:port(Listen),
  354:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Listen),
  355:     Port.
